channel.title: Best iOS app for editing samples?
channel.description:
Hi, all (but maybe especially @iammane)...
QQ: what‚Äôs the best iOS app for editing and saving out samples?
e.g. if I have a WAV sample on iCloud, but want to trim it precisely and save it back to iCloud as a new WAV file
Is there anything out there that also allows for cue/transient warping, to clean up the timing of something‚Äôs not quite on the beat?
  TIA

item.title: Best iOS app for editing samples?
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
AudioShare for trimming, normalizing, fading and converting files.

Blocs Wave for chopping, slicing and time stretching loops.
